faq.question: Are AI employees replacing my team?
faq.answer: No — they augment teams, handle repetitive tasks, and free humans for high-value work.

faq.question: How is data handled?
faq.answer: Your data remains private. We train role models on your dataset with enterprise-grade encryption and audit logs.

faq.question: How long till results?
faq.answer: Pilots return measurable impact within 2–6 weeks depending on scope.

faq.question: Who owns the outputs?
faq.answer: You retain ownership. We give you logs, prompts, and exportable models.
